logentries_key: Enter the key obtained from logentries
github_username: The owner of the repository. Either your github username or organization name.
db_name: Name of the database (ignore if you have selected sqlite3 as db_type)
db_username: Username for the database. (ignore if you have selected sqlite3 as db_type)
db_password: passsword for the database. (ignore if you have selected sqlite3 as db_type)
